scripts.cover: tsc && node ./node_modules/istanbul/lib/cli.js cover -x '**/logger.*' _mocha dist/*.spec.js && ./node_modules/.bin/remap-istanbul -i ./coverage/coverage.json -o ./reports/coverage/lcov.info -t lcovonly && rimraf coverage
scripts.build: npm run tslint && rimraf dist && tsc
scripts.bump: npm version patch && git push --tags origin master
scripts.bump:minor: npm version minor && git push --tags origin master
scripts.bump:major: npm version major && git push --tags origin master
